topics.body: Here's something for minecraft players: if you absolutely hate mods or find them too hard to understand try "feed the beast" launcher's "vanilla+" modpack.  It's everything that vanilla minecraft should be but isn't.  It adds in a bunch of decorative blocks like chairs, pianos, brooms or such.  Most of the stuff doesn't do anything, but it makes minecraft look a lot better.
